update(float) - Method in class com.berbils.game.entities.patrols.AlienPatrol
* The update method needs to be called every world update: The movement for the patrol is handled here.
update(float) - Method in class com.berbils.game.entities.powerup.Powerup
Updates the powerup every tick counts down the active time and then deactivates powerup
update(float) - Method in class com.berbils.game.entities.powerup.WeaponPowerup
 
update(float) - Method in class com.berbils.game.entities.projectilespawner.projectiletype.ExplodingBulletCircle
This update method is used to ensure Explosion textures dissapear after the correct amount of time and that projectiles can only travel a max distance of their max range as defined.
update(float) - Method in class com.berbils.game.entities.projectilespawner.projectiletype.Explosion
Must be called when the world is updated and is there to check how long the explosion texture has been on screen for, removing it if it has been on for longer than the explosion time
update(float) - Method in class com.berbils.game.entities.projectilespawner.projectiletype.Projectiles
* Must be called when the world is updated and is there to check how far the projectile has travelled , removing it if it has travelled for further than its max range dictates
update(float) - Method in class com.berbils.game.entities.towers.Tower
* The update method needs to be called every world update:The health bar is updated and any explosions caused by the death of the tower are updated to go away after a set amount of time via this
update() - Method in class com.berbils.game.scenes.HUD
Updates all the labels
update(float) - Method in class com.berbils.game.screens.MiniGame
Called every rendering tick.
update(float) - Method in class com.berbils.game.screens.PlayScreen
Updates the Play Screen every tick Steps the world, destroys all Box2D bodys that are queued for removal, also updates all towers, projectiles, fixture-associated sprites and the HUD.
update() - Method in class com.berbils.game.tools.FrameRate
 
updateAndDrawAllSprites(SpriteBatch) - Method in class com.berbils.game.handlers.SpriteHandler
Goes through every fixture associated sprite first, updates them draws them.Then it goes through every sprite-only sprite and draws them .Both on the correct layer
updateAndDrawAllSprites(SpriteBatch) - Method in class com.berbils.game.handlers.SpriteHandlerMini
Goes through every fixture associated sprite first, updates them draws them.Then it goes through every sprite-only sprite and draws them .Both on the correct layer
updateCamera(float) - Method in class com.berbils.game.screens.PlayScreen
Updates the camera every tick to follow the player Also clamps the camera to prevent it viewing outside the map at which point it no longer follows the player until they move away from the boundaries again
updateLabels(float, float, float) - Method in class com.berbils.game.screens.SelectFireEngineScreen
 
updatePlayerScore(int) - Method in class com.berbils.game.screens.MiniGame

updatePlayerScore(int) - Method in class com.berbils.game.screens.PlayScreen
